question: You want to book a hotel recommended to you for a family holiday at the seaside. Write a letter to the hotel manager to make arrangements. • explain what accommodation you require and when you want to stay • ask what will be included in the price • enquire about activities and places of interest near the hotel
text: A very good day to you. I Prabhjot Singh, am a resident of 123 PAU, Campus, Ludhiana. I am writing this letter in order to book a room at your property. Moreover, I have some sort of queries related to the accommodation. I am going to plan to stay at your hotel from the 1st of April 2022 to the 3rd of April 2022 with my wife and 2 years old son.

I visited your hotel's website, but unfortunately, I was not able to get full details of the facilities provided in the premium room with a sea view. I want to know that Is breakfast is included in the cost of the premium room. We have a small child with us during our stay, I want a small refrigerator in the room so as to store some medicine that is required for our child.
Since it is our first visit to the Shimla, Kindly let me know about the famous places and entertainment activities near the hotel. I shall be very thankful to you.
Waiting for the room confirmation email.
